scan_script_only_check.description: EDM ( Employee Document Management) Module table as part of HRSD contains sensitive employee files e.g offer letters, term letters, promotion letter etc . This data should not be cloned from production to sub production instances since sub prod may have many admins which can see this data which will cause security issues.
scan_script_only_check.name: EDM table doesn't have clone exclusion on Prod
scan_script_only_check.resolution_details: 1. Verify production instance to check if sn_hr_ef_employee_document Table is configured in clone exclude table. 2. Set up exclusion for this table in production instnace if not already present.
scan_script_only_check.short_description: EDM table doesn't have clone exclusion on Prod
